Package context.apps.demos.helloroom


Class Summary
HelloRoom Main class for Hello World context-aware application of a living room smart lamp.
HelloRoomIntelligible Intelligible version of the Hello Room tutorial application.
LightService Custom service for the room application to set the light level.
